comments.author: Carsten Ziegeler
comments.body: Just as an additional comment: this is not only a security risk but imho wrong path handling

comments.author: Jukka Zitting
comments.body: Merged to the 2.2 branch in revision 1126998, to 2.1 in revision 1127002 and to 2.0 in revision 1127004.

description:
o.a.jackrabbit.spi.commons.conversion.PathParser accepts the following path:

"/public/.{.}/private"

the normalized resulting Path object represents "/private" 

that's a potential security risk.
summary: PathParser accepts illegal paths containing curly brackets
